|cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=4 GiB |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MTFC4GACAAAM-1M WT |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41J256M16HA-125:E |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe (no-soldered) |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |serial=yes,, console,, RJ45,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1545;88E1545-LKJ2; |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=RS-232 Line Driver;Texas Instruments;MAX3227;;1; ,,, Serial EEPROM (256Kb);Microchip Technology;24LC256;;1; ,,, AVR Microcontroller (16-bit);Atmel;XMEGA32A4U;;1; ,,, Four Output Clock Generator;Micrel;DSC400;;1; |flags=SD Card slot |stock_boot=UBoot;2013.07; |stock_os=Linux;3.10.20;OpenWrt; |default_ip=10.10.10.10 |default_user=admin |default_pass=itus |oui_eth=2C:26:2F }} {{TagLine|Home Network Security Appliance}} :[http://archive.is/0EbU7 Product page] (archive) ===Links=== *[https://forum.archive.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=62460 ''Itus Shield Pro'' on '''OpenWrt''' forum] (forum.archive.openwrt.org) *[http://linuxgizmos.com/cavium-adds-openwrt-support-to-octeon-iii/ ''Cavium adds OpenWrt support to Octeon III'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://openwrt.org/toh/itus_networks/itus_networks_shield ''Itus Shield'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] ([https://github.com/ItusShield/Itus_Shield_v2/commits/master ''Itus Shield v2'' on '''GitHub''']) ===See also=== *[[ITUS Networks Shield]] (v2) • [https://openwrt.org/toh/itus_networks/itus_networks_shield ''Itus Shield'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[[ITUS Networks Shield WiFi]] • [https://www.amazon.com/dp/B014CTRTSU/ B014CTRTSU] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] @900MHz (ARMv7) :RAM: 1GB; microSD Card 8Gb; 802.11bgn :LAN: 1x FE ports; OS: OpenWrt Chaos Calmer *[[ITUS Networks iGardian]] • [https://www.kickstarterr.com/projects/itus/iguardian-the-home-internet-security-system/faqs ''FAQ'' on '''KickStarter'''] • [http://linuxgizmos.com/networking-security-appliance-runs-snort-on-openwrt/ LinuxGizmos] :CPU: [[Cavium]] CNS3420 @600MHz Dual-core ''Econa'' (ARM11) :RAM: 512MB, Flash: 32MB, 8GB Micro SD Card ---- *[[Rhino Labs Beetle 1]] • [[Cavium]] ''Econa'' SoC, 5x GbE ports • [https://hardlinux.ru/note/31577 HardLinux] *[[Rhino Labs RLNA6X8GE]] • [[Cavium]] ''Octeon II'' (10-cores SoC), 4x/8x GbE • [http://rhinolabsinc.com/all-products/#SDNA SDNA] *[[Rhino Labs SDNA-7890]] • [[Cavium]] ''Octeon III'' CN7890 (48-cores SoC) • [http://rhinolabsinc.com/sdna-7890/ PPage] *[[Sophos APX 120]] • [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 *[[Sophos UTM110]] • [[Intel Atom]] (595$) *[[Netgear ProSecure UTM110]] • (495$) *[[Netgear ProSecure UTM150]] • [https://www.storagereview.com/review/netgear-prosecure-utm150-review Review] :CPU: [[Cavium]] CN5230 @750MHz ''Octeon Plus'' (Quad Core) :Flash/RAM: 2GB/1GB, WAN/LAN: 4x/4x GbE (RJ45), 1x USB port *[[Nexcom NSA 5640]] • [[Freescale]] (UTM) ==Images== ---- ---- [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
